reviews.review: The story had more plot than the first movie. however, there were some slow action scenes that could’ve used more “pizzazz”
Its an amazing movie. Recommend it for the family.
Excellent production and good message. The song score is fair, nothing exceptional, and kids in theatre got restless because they are long and drawn out.
I love Frozen 1 and Frozen 2 was even better!

Disney finally did it! They made a successful princess sequel! This movie was amazing. It had a great story line that was easy for children to follow but yet had plenty of depth to keep an adult's interest. My 2-year-old daughter saw this for the first time in Bucharest, Romania. It was her first 3D movie and first IMAX movie (with Romanian subtitles). She kept the glasses on the entire show! We just got back to the states and went to see it for a second time. This time she never even took a bathroom break. She just sat on the edge of her seat until the credits began to roll which is when she got up (same as the first time) and began to dance to the music. We loved the songs. Especially the fact that each character has their own powerful song. This movie doesn't just have 1 good song...there are several. Frozen 2 was full of positive messages about female empowerment, growing up and even stereotyping. It is not only a great sequel, but possibly better than the original.
Is it just me or do they sing a lot more? Cartoons are so improved in visual its easy to forget it is one. My 10-year old granddaughter loved it. So I have to say it was very entertaining.
Animation is great.  Brand new story with new characters yet all the favorites are still there.  The entire theatre laughed out loud several times.  A must see.
I liked everything about the movie.

Between me, my wife, 2 daughters, and my son, only my youngest daughter (9) didn't think it was a complete waste of time but she wasn't asking me to buy it when it comes out on DVD either. The plot was slightly less lame than the first one, but that's not saying much...
Enjoyable movie - great escape from reality !
